OrgName.entry: WHITE PLUM SHEFFIELD ZEN BUDDHIST GROUP

Desc.entry: Practises within both the Soto and Rinzai Zen Buddhist traditions. Founded by the Japanese Zen Master Taizan Maezumi Roshi. Part of the international White Plum Asangha. Meetings consist of Zazen meditation and walking meditation followed by tea and a discussion around a Buddhist text. Runs a retreat in Derbyshire and other occasional events. Newcomers welcome, dedicated beginners night. No experience necessary.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues 7.15-9.15pm, 1st Tues in the month (beginners night) please contact for details
